resources.string: NASA\'s Astronomy Picture Of the Day (APOD)
Failed to connect to the API
What did earth look like that day?
Here\'s what Earth looked like on %1$s

Welcome to the unofficial APOD app! It uses NASA\'s astronomy picture of the day API, allowing you to access a daily updated selection of fascinating astronomic imagery. There are several different modes to choose from below. For dates after July 2015, you can also see a picture of Earth from that date using another api from NASA (abbreviated to EPIC). Note: Earth imagery might be unavailable for certain dates.
Unfortunately, there is no picture of the Earth for this date as of yet. Please select another date. \t (Hint: You can see something interesting on 11 February, 2021)
